ej,rothl101,M,mcclt901,Demanding Pedro Martinez' ejection ej,willg001,P,cuzzp901,Charging mound after HBP $Gerald Williams charged mound, knocked down Pedro Martinez then was tackled by Jason Varitek; both benches cleared; Williams ejected by HP umpire Phil Cuzzi; Devil Rays Manager Larry Rothschild ejected by 2B umpire Tim McClelland demanding that Martinez be ejected; this started a game-long beanball war which resulted in eight ejections; Martinez retired 24 consecutive batters after this HBP; Red Sox 1B Brian Daubach hurt his arm in the melee and was taken to the hospital for X-rays after the game
$the Devil Rays thought that Brian Daubach took some cheap shots in the scrum after Pedro Martinez hit Gerald Williams in the first inning; thus, they targeted Daubach
